title: 820-01521 no power
message:
This arrived with no liquid damage. Customer claims it just randomly stopped turning on.

Stuck at 5v. All AWAKE and SLP2R voltages are present and stable.

PPBUS_G3H 12.35V

When plugging into other mac apple configurator 2 automatically goes in  DFU mode without pressing keyboard keys. Revive or restore instantly fail.

Anything else worth checking or just bad T2?

title: 820-01521 no power
message: Did you check for liquid sign on audio board?

title: 820-01521 no power
message: yes and there was no liquid

title: 820-01521 no power
message:
Force off the target machine; pressing power button 4-5s.
Then try to put it in DFU mode in normal way.

title: 820-01521 no power
message: After pressing power button 5 seconds it will momentairly get out of DFU mode for 1 second or less then automatically goes back into DFU mode
